title: Can "Skip Waiting For Stats" Please Be Made a Setting?
body:
I don't like going into the end game lobby where mutes don't carry over and you're inevitably subjected to toxicity and whining.   The "skip waiting for stats" button rarely pops up for me because I'm on a beastie computer with decent internet. I'd much rather it be a setting so I can just access the honor screen and then go straight to the Home screen, skipping the post -game lobby entirely if I so desire.   (This would also help with remade games to have it skip the pointless end game lobby and make joining a new one that much faster.)

If it can't be made a persisted setting, could it please be made to appear for longer amounts of time so I can click it in time if I have good specs?  Is there something in my settings files that already exists that I can tweak to skip end game lobby by myself?

replies.body: if there can also be a toggle for skipping the honor screen, it's so annoying having to go through the lobby AND the honor screen
